value.stringValue: Update Referred Application to Deferred Application

actionCalls.name: myRule_10_A4
actionCalls.label: Update Referred Application to Deferred Application

value.stringValue:
OR( AND(OR( PRIORVALUE([Application__c].Adjudication_Path_picklist__c ) = 'ADJ_In progress', PRIORVALUE([Application__c].Adjudication_Path_picklist__c ) = 'Deferred'), ISCHANGED([Application__c].Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c ), ISPICKVAL([Application__c].Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c, 'Manual Decline') ),
AND(OR( PRIORVALUE([Application__c].Adjudication_Path_picklist__c ) = 'ADJ_In progress', PRIORVALUE([Application__c].Adjudication_Path_picklist__c ) = 'Deferred'), ISCHANGED([Application__c].Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c ), ISPICKVAL([Application__c].Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c, 'Manual Approve') ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_8
formulas.expression:
OR( AND(OR( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Path_picklist__c} ) = 'ADJ_In progress', PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Path_picklist__c} ) = 'Deferred'), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c}, 'Manual Decline') ),
AND(OR( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Path_picklist__c} ) = 'ADJ_In progress', PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Path_picklist__c} ) = 'Deferred'), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Adjudication_Decision_picklist__c}, 'Manual Approve') ) )

recordCreates.name: myRule_1_A1
recordCreates.label: Create case related to the Application

recordUpdates.name: myRule_10_A3
recordUpdates.label: Reassign Application to Omni Channel Queue
